WorkItem.Description: Sheet names must always be returned as UTF-8 when one loads a spreadsheet using PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5. This holds true for Excel 97 - Excel 2003 files (BIFF8), but not for Excel 95 files (BIFF5). In the latter case, sheet names are returned using the codepage of the workbook.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 not returning sheet names as UTF-8 using for Excel 95 files
